website_summaries.verdict: A commercial freezer with a curved top that is designed to display items such as ice cream, but it can also be used in a home.
pros: This stylish freezer has a capacity of 2.7 cubic feet
The stainless steel interior is easy to maintain and the unit is set on castor wheels
The door can be clocked, if desired
cons: This freezer is designed to display product
It could be tucked away in a garage or a basement, but ideally, you're paying for it to be seen

customer_reviews.title: Unit didn't work right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new unit showed up and doesn't work right out of the box. Manufacturer refuses to replace starting that they will send out a service tech. I paid for a new unit. I want one that works without a service tech having to work on it day one. Im in the hvac industry and I know that there will always be issues with this now that its having issues with the refrigerant circuit. I belive I will just return the unit. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking unit on the sales floor that customers see
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit on the sales floor that customers see. But, the picture shows 4 baskets inside of the freezer - we received only 2. That doesn't quite make sense to me because you do need 4 baskets to display retail merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Dsp

customer_reviews.title: Great Freezer, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I received the freezer 3 days after ordering it. It arrived well packed, in perfect shape. The temperature dropped to zero within 3 hours of being plugged in and has fluctuated, fully loaded with food, between zero and -14. It runs quietly. I love the fact that the freezer has easy to remove baskets (4) and I can see what is in it through the glass slide lids. I could not be happier with the freezer or more pleased with the shipping speed!
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Like the rollers for easy moving. Sleek item.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item. Like see through glass. Do not like adjusting temperature with a screwdriver. Prefer a knob. Had to purchase 2 additional baskets even though it was pictured with all 4 of them. Only 2 came. It’s a little noisy every time it turns on throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: P Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Experience has been positive so far
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, large capacity and good looking. Seller is very responsive and helpful. Delivered promptly. Shipping company staff is very helpful as well. Cannot comment on quality since only own it for one day. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: P.  Hui

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: The friezer looks nice but too much water on top of the sliding lids. We have to wipe it every day; therefore, no a 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: JADE CASADY

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This company even in the current situation (covid-19) was so responsive and helpful. The freezer was delivered in 3 days and was up and running in 4 hours! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Really good freezer, does what it's supposed to. We use it at home and can actually keep our food stocked up. It's also very nice to be able to see what we have without opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey M.

customer_reviews.title: keeping everything frozen...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice freezer for my garage have had it for a month so far keeping everything frozen like the top so I can see what I need before opening..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST DIED ON ME - WHAT A MESS!
customer_reviews.text: Received this in the spring - late April I believe. September 27th it died. I had not been in it for a month or so, seemed to be working fine. Then came that smell! UPDATE: THEY HAVE VERY QUICKLY AGREED TO SEND A REPLACEMENT SO GOOD REVIEW FOR BEING SO RESPONSIVE!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service, fast delivery, good price !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service !!! Is a pleasure when you buy something and everything is perfect ! Thank you congrats !
customer_reviews.author: noelia

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery Super Roomy Piece of mind purchase for my store front
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery Super Roomy Piece of mind purchase for my store front
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: No good for Acai Bowls or Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these units for a stores.. have had nothing but problems trying to control the temp, bottom completely freezes and the top does not! we've tried everything including changing to a wider range thermostat specifically for ice cream ect from webstraunt... and same thing.. also builds up a ton of ice on top due to cheap doors that dont fit properly
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany okolichany

product_meta.title: Atosa MMF9112 Angle Curved Top Chest Freezer 12 Cubic Feet
product_meta.description: MMF-9112 Angle Curved Top Chest Freezer Standard Features: Atosa curved class Freezers are uniquely designed to store ice cream and all types of frozen merchandise and seasonal specialties. 3 inch insulation foam wall secures cold effect using environmentally friendly refrigeration system, and with high energy efficiency. Maintains-10 ° F (-23.33 °C) to -1 °F, ideal for both ice cream and frozen food. Exterior white pre-coated steel cabinet is durable and permanent with big radius stylish blue plastic top and lid frames. Interior white pre-coated aluminum is NSF Sanitation approved, and is durable and easy to clean. Tempered glass slide lids with reflective film reduces solar heat gain, enhances energy efficiency and minimizes condensation. Standard door locks provides security prevents theft. Convenient defrost drain for easy cleaning. 2” (50MM) diameter stem castors. Standard Epoxy coatedwhite basket to keep smaller items in place.
feature_bullets: Manufacturer's Warranty: 1 year parts and labor, 5 year compressor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
